column4: Are there any problems using a wireless keyboard and mouse on ubuntu 9.04?
Hi all. Just wondering if there are any generally known problems using a wireless keyboard and mouse in Ubuntu 9.04. If so, are there any suggestions on which brand to buy?
anyone? Hi all. Just wondering if there are any generally known problems using a wireless keyboard and mouse in Ubuntu 9.04. If so, are there any suggestions on which brand to buy?
no problems, most USB stuff just works
